summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'AutoDock4', 'OpenCL' | Accelerating AutoDock4 with GPUs and Gradient-Based Local Search | AutoDock-GPU: AutoDock for GPUs using OpenCL | Molecular Graphics Laboratory, TSRI | Besides the legacy Solis-Wets local search method, AutoDock-GPU adds newly implemented local-search methods based on gradients of the scoring function. One of these methods, ADADELTA, has proven to increase significantly the docking quality in terms of RMSDs and scores
summary.name: AutoDock-GPU
